item.title: A journey through my music tastes
item.description: I’ve had this blog post as a draft for a couple months now. And who knows how long it would have stayed as a draft, but Keith Flint of The Prodigy died this week, and given how much I owe to The Prodigy being one of my earliest electronic loves, I felt I should actually publish it. My music taste and the different artists that I've listened to throughout my life is a big part of my identity.
